controller

Class HarvestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.HarvestController

  • public class HarvestController
extends java.lang.Object
    The HarvestController class coordinates the functions available in the Data Managers for the Menu class. It manages PlotDataManager, FarmerDataManager, CropDataManager, and RankDataManager.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HarvestController()
      Constructs a HarvestController object and Initialises Data Managers

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> harvest(Farmer f)
                                              throws FarmCityControlException,
                                                     java.io.IOException
        Process of user harvesting plot
        Parameters:
        f - The Farmer object of user
        Returns:
        output The message for successful harvesting
        Throws:
        FarmCityControlException - Throw exception when there is no plot to harvest
        java.io.IOException - Throw exception when there is no plots.csv or information.csv
